casebody.data:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD v. ALLSTEEL PRODUCTS MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Inc. No. 2105. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. May 2, 1940. Robert B. Watts, Associate Gen. Counsel, National Labor Relations Board, of Washington, D. C., for petitioner. Foulston, Siefkin, Foulston & Morris, George B. Powers, and Carl T. Smith, all of Wichita, Kan., for respondent.

Before PHILLIPS, BRATTON, and HUXMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Application granted. Consent decree entered pursuant to stipulation of the parties.
